document_data.name: Setara bint Farid
document_data.home: [[Gana]], [[Zakhara]]{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1992 GenCon promo set|2|Setara bint Farid}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Setara bint Farid''' was the [[human]] female captain of the ship ''[[Spray]]'', operating in the [[Crowded Sea]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Setara was a muscular, brown-haired woman, who wore [[padded armor]].
document_data.Personality: She was more interested in gaining fame, rather than fortune. Setara tended to get into more trouble than she could handle.
document_data.Possessions: Setara owned a ''[[ring of swimming]]'', as well as a magical [[cutlass]].
document_data.History: Setara hailed from the city of [[Gana]]. She once insulted the [[marid]] [[Nabil]], leading to a personal feud.
